tumor_size_max_dimension_evidence: No information provided in the pathology report.
pT_evidence: The tumor classification on the basis of this material is pT4, as stated in the pathology report.
pN_evidence: The tumor classification on the basis of this material is pN1, as stated in the pathology report.
tumor_stage_evidence: The tumor classification on the basis of this material is stage IV, as stated in the pathology report, based on pT4 and pN1 categories.
histologic_diagnosis_evidence: The immune profile confirms the diagnosis of an adenocarcinoma of the lung of mixed differentiation, as stated in the pathology report.
comment: The pathology report describes a locoregionally advanced, central to peripheral, very likely primarily peripheral bronchopulmonary, histologically mixed adenocarcinoma of the right lower lobe of the lung with pleural invasion and metastatic dissemination to both pleural layers and lymph nodes. The tumor classification is pT4 pN1 pM1 (P/E) V1 RX, stage IV.
